gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class EventReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.EventReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphiteEventReporter, InfluxDBEventReporter, KafkaEventReporter, OutputStreamEventReporter

    public abstract class EventReporter
extends com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
implements Closeable
    Abstract class for reporting GobblinTrackingEvents at a fixed schedule.

    Subclasses should implement reportEventQueue(java.util.Queue<gobblin.metrics.GobblinTrackingEvent>) to emit the events to the sink. Events will only be reported once, and then removed from the event queue.

      • getMetricName

        protected String getMetricName(Map<String,String> metadata,
                               String eventName)
        Constructs the metric key to be emitted. The actual event name is enriched with the current job and task id to be able to keep track of its origin
        Parameters:
        metadata - metadata of the actual GobblinTrackingEvent
        eventName - name of the actual GobblinTrackingEvent
        Returns:
        prefix of the metric key
